articles.author: Luke James
articles.title: Intel Set to Outsource Select CPU Production to TSMC's 5nm Process - News - All About Circuits
articles.description: Market analysts have reported that TSMC is to begin making Intel’s Core i3 chips on a 5nm process later this year, marking the latest in a series of struggles for Intel with its leading-edge process technology at both 10nm and 7nm.
articles.content:
TrendForce says that Intel has outsourced the production of roughly 15-20% of its non-CPU chips to date with most of these products assigned to TSMC or UMC. 
Production of Intel’s Core i3 chips will… [+3534 chars]
